НОВАЯ ВЕРСИЯ СЕТЕВОГО ШУТЕРА НОМЕР ОДИН В МИРЕ 
Игра «Counter-Strike: Source» сочетает в себе триумфальную командную слаженность «Counter-Strike» с передовой технологией Source™. Обладающий соответствующей последним достижениям технической мысли графикой, полностью обновленным звуком и реальной физикой, «Counter-Strike: Source» просто должен занять почетное место в коллекции каждого поклонника жанра «экшен».
ксс супер играйте в нее вем удачи в игре

Für mich einer der Besten, wenn nicht sogar der beste Shooter überhaupt.
Macht Spaß, super für Lanpartys oder alleine Online gegen andere und vor allem gibt's viele Custom Maps und Mods.
Worse than csgo but more expensive
Great game, would recommend this game to anyone who likes FPS games...

This game is amazing.
There is SO much more in this game then CS:GO. 
Community is great, it has some REALLY good servers, love playing on them. 
This game also feels like a REAL Counter Strike game. No cases, no drops, no skins. This game is just about shooting (Counter) Terrorists and having fun!

I'm so happy that i bought this game. I really recommend this game if you already play CS:GO!
Its a pretty nice shooter 'n stuff :D

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Плюсы и минусы:
+ Множество серверов разный вкус и цвет(включая сервера с ботами)
- Большая часть серверов пустует(для меня это минус)
+ Очень мало читеров
- Но всетаки они (читеры) есть
+ Атмосфера CS
+ Стабильная физика
+ Подойдет для владельцев старых\слабых ПК и ноутов
+ Минимум школоты
+ Нет доната
+ Нет выпендрежа на счет скинов и т.п.
+ И вообще это лучшая (по моему мнению) игра от Valve
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
+ Lots of servers, different taste and color(including servers with bots)
- Most servers are empty(for me it's a minus)
+ Very few cheaters
- But they (cheaters) have
+ Atmosphere CS
+ Stable physics
+ Suitable for owners of old\weak PC and laptops.
+ Low shkoloty
+ No donation
+ There is no showboating at the expense of the skins, etc.
+ And in General it is best (in my opinion) game from Valve
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

- is very expensive for a CS

It's the best Counter Strike game ever made.
Pretty nice graphics, you can play with bots offline. 
If you get bored with the normal maps there are many other options like surf,deathrun,zombie etc.
I suggest it to anyone who has a med-low computer. 



10/10. <3
Fun, low recoil and I can rekt so many noobs. Also, you can get free skins/knives! :)

This game may have been swept out of the spotlight but it's still a solid game with a community large enough to justify the purchase. Considering the age of its engine along with its reasonable computing demands, it's visually appealing and makes good use of textures. Many servers have a lot of custom content so be prepared to download when you join one for the first time, though this does offer a lot of variety. Oh and if you're a GO fan that's curious about this, GunGame is pretty much the same as arms race, there's no shortage of this game-mode.
Counter Strike o que dizer desse fudido jogo,maravilhoso,CS <3.

bought it only for Garry's Mod textures.
10/10

I only got the game for more Gmod Textures

11/10 would get all the textures again

Great game! This game will run on practically anything, as it came out in 2004 and runs on the Source Engine. The graphics still look good as well! If you're deciding between this and CS:GO, Source is a game where hardly anyone takes it seriously. So if you don't want to hear people rage, get this.
